name: Flat Earther
description:
Submission for Snappy Gurus Game Off Summer 2022

Run around the globe avoiding scientists to convince the sheeple that the world is flat. Remain ignorant so you can enjoy the bliss of the universe! 

Controls

WASD - to move

Mouse to look left and right

E - to convert the Sheeple

Q - to put your head in the ground and remain ignorant from the scientists

P - Pause game

Credits
